text: Ty nepremenno naydesh' samymi lyutymi vragami veruyushchikh iudeyev i mnogobozhnikov. Ty takzhe nepremenno naydesh', chto blizhe vsekh v lyubvi k veruyushchim, yavlyayutsya te, kotoryye govoryat: «My - khristiane». Eto potomu, chto sredi nikh yest' svyashchenniki i monakhi, i potomu, chto oni ne proyavlyayut vysokomeriya
